name: custom-annotation-samples
description: A repo containing examples on creating custom annotations in PDF.js Express

scripts.copy: cross-env rm -rf static/lib && cp -a node_modules/@pdftron/pdfjs-express/public/. static/lib && cp -a node_modules/@pdftron/pdfjs-express/webviewer.min.js static/lib/webviewer.min.js

author: Logan Bittner
